JobFullDesc: Messenger Design Systems is responsible for making the Messenger app sustainable, fast, high quality, and easy to use. We do so through our Messenger Design System which encompasses anything from our component library to our visual systems, with the goal of delivering an exceptional user experience to people using Messenger. We are looking for an experienced Production Designer with high craft, attention to detail, and superb organization skills to support our product design team across various design initiatives. Production Designers partner with Product Designers to evolve Messenger’s component library, templates, and design tools.
